Creature: Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Kinship — At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with this creature, you may reveal it. If you do, {KINSHIP_EFFECT}.
Other {CLASS_TYPE} creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever another {CLASS_TYPE} enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
This creature has first strike as long as you control another {WARRIOR_TRIBE}.
This creature has hexproof as long as you control another {WIZARD_TRIBE}.
This creature has menace as long as you control another {ROGUE_TRIBE}.
This creature has trample as long as you control another {WARRIOR_TRIBE}.
This creature has lifelink as long as you control another {SOLDIER_TRIBE}.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} you tap an untapped {TRIBE} you control, {ACTIVATED_EFFECT}
When this creature enters the battlefield, {TRIBE} spells you cast this turn cost {1} less to cast.
When this creature enters the battlefield, create a {N}/{N} {TOKEN_COLOR} {TOKEN_SUBTYPE} creature token.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} another {TRIBE} you control dies, draw a card.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} another {WARRIOR_TRIBE} enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature entered with a +1/+1 counter on it, that creature gains trample until end of turn.
Each other {WARRIOR_TRIBE} creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry {N}.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} you cast a {WIZARD_TRIBE} spell, draw a card, then discard a card.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} a {ROGUE_TRIBE} you control deals combat damage to a player, that player mills {N}.

{TRIGGER_INTRO} this creature deals combat damage to a player, search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for up to {N} cards with the same name as a nonland card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} a creature dies, untap this creature.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} this creature becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to any target.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} this creature attacks with at least two other creatures, create a 1/1 {TOKEN_COLOR} {SOLDIER_TRIBE} creature token tapped and attacking.
Sorcery: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
Put two +1/+1 counters on target {TRIBE} you control. Creatures you control that share a creature type with it gain vigilance until end of turn.
Prowl {ACTIVATED_COST} (You may cast this spell for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a {ROGUE_TRIBE}.) If this spell's prowl cost was paid, {PROWL_BONUS}.
Put {N} +1/+1 counters on target creature. If it shares a creature type with a creature you control, put an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Instant: Target creature gets +{N}/+{N} until end of turn. If it shares a creature type with a creature you control, it gains first strike until end of turn.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If you control a {WIZARD_TRIBE}, scry {N}.
Create two 1/1 {TOKEN_COLOR} {ROGUE_TRIBE} creature tokens. If a {ROGUE_TRIBE} you control dealt combat damage to a player this turn, create three of those tokens instead.
Prowl {ACTIVATED_COST} (You may cast this spell for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a {ROGUE_TRIBE}.) If this spell's prowl cost was paid, {PROWL_BONUS}.
Target {TRIBE} you control phases out. Draw a card.
Enchantment: {TRIGGER_INTRO} you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
As this enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {TRIBE} creatures you control have vigilance and '{ACTIVATED_COST}: Create a 1/1 {TOKEN_COLOR} {SOLDIER_TRIBE} creature token.'
Artifact: As this enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Equipped and enchanted creatures of the chosen type get +{N}/+{N}.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} a {TRIBE} you control becomes tapped, this deals 1 damage to any target.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has haste. Whenever a {WARRIOR_TRIBE} enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach this to it. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Equipped creature has '{TRIGGER_INTRO} a creature dies, untap equipped creature.' Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Equipped {WIZARD_TRIBE} gets +1/+1 and has '{ACTIVATED_COST}: Draw a card, then discard a card.' Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Equipped {ROGUE_TRIBE} gets +1/+0 and has menace. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Equipped {SOLDIER_TRIBE} gets +1/+1 and has vigilance. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Equipped {SHAMAN_TRIBE} has '{ACTIVATED_COST}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target.' Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchant {TRIBE} creature. Enchanted creature gets +{N}/+{N} and has vigilance.
Enchant creature. Enchanted creature is every creature type in addition to its other types.
Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control that shares a creature type with it.
Activated: Reinforce {N}—{ACTIVATED_COST} (Discard this card: Put {N} +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
Prowl {ACTIVATED_COST} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a {ROGUE_TRIBE}.)
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Target {WIZARD_TRIBE} you control gains hexproof until end of turn.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Target {WARRIOR_TRIBE} gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Create a 1/1 {TOKEN_COLOR} {SOLDIER_TRIBE} creature token.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Target {ROGUE_TRIBE} can't be blocked this turn.
Land: As this enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Treefolk card from your hand. If you don't, this enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}. {TRIBE} spells you cast cost {1} less to cast this turn. Activate only once each turn.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a {TRIBE} spell or activate an ability of a {TRIBE}.
